1.title: Nuts and Bolts
1.plot: Discover the preventable reason for the crash of Emery Worldwide Flight 17 in 2000.

2.title: Blown Away
2.plot: See how two accidents over seven months led investigators to a shocking conclusion about a Taiwanese airline.

3.title: Deadly Distraction
3.plot: Air crash investigators struggle to figure out why a Boeing 727 crashed on takeoff on a clear summer day.

4.title: Deadly Airspace
4.plot: Revisit the controversial 2014 crash of Malaysia Airlines Flight MH17, which broke apart over a war zone.

5.title: Deadly Display
5.plot: How could a brand-new jet with a sophisticated navigation system and an expert crew fatally lose its way?

6.title: Deadly Space
6.plot: Follow investigators as they try to explain why a test flight for a Virgin Galactic spacecraft went so wrong so quickly.

1.title: Invisible Killer
1.plot: On August 2 1985 a L-1011 Delta Flight 191 to Dallas/Fort Worth Airport crashes due to a micro-burst when it was already at a low altitude. 136 lives are lost. Sweeping changes are made to airport weather radar as a result of this accident.

2.title: Gimli Glider
2.plot: On July 23, 1983 Air Canada Flight 143 a Boeing 767-2xx from Montreal to Edmonton runs out of fuel at cruising altitude. What follows is one of the best stories in modern aviation.

3.title: Behind Closed Doors
3.plot: On June 12, 1972 American Airlines flight 96 on its way from Detroit to Buffalo experiences a rapid decompression. The plane is a Brand new DC-10 and this flight tested the highly experienced flight crew to their limits.

4.title: Fanning the Flames
4.plot: When South African Airways Flight 295 caught fire and crashed at sea in 1987, rumors swirled that it was the target of a terrorist attack. Getting to the bottom of this catastrophic mystery meant going to the bottom of the Indian Ocean, an unprecedented recovery operation that took months and cost millions to complete.

5.title: Dead Weight
5.plot: Air Midwest 5481 plummets to earth just after take off killing all on board and injuring one on the ground.

6.title: Southern Storm
6.plot: The crew of a DC-9 find themselves in a violent storm. Rain and baseball-sized hail hammer the aircraft and shatter the windshield. When both engines fail, the pilots must land their plane on a rural Georgia highway, a maneuver that ultimately costs the lives of eighty people.

7.title: Explosive Evidence
7.plot: Air India Flight 182 was destroyed by a bomb at an altitude of 31,000 feet (9,400 m). It crashed into the Atlantic Ocean while in Irish airspace.

8.title: Mixed Signals
8.plot: Conflicting alarms confuse pilots of Birgenair Flight 301 before it crashes into the ocean with no survivors.

9.title: Fatal Distraction
9.plot: The Eastern Airlines flight 401 crash: the deadliest disaster in U.S. civil aviation history.

10.title: Phantom Strike
10.plot: Business plane collides with 737 in 2006 crash over the Amazon Rainforest. Technological and human errors.

1.title: Cracks in the System
1.plot: The 2005 crash of Chalk's Ocean Airways Flight 101 that killed 20 people just off Miami Beach

2.title: Target Is Destroyed
2.plot: Detailing the shooting down of Korean Airlines 007 by the Soviets in 1983.

3.title: Cruel Skies
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Panic on the Runway
4.plot: How does a survivable airline emergency turn into one of British aviation's most horrific disasters?

5.title: Alarming Silence
5.plot: Northwest Airlines flight 255 crashes shortly after take-off in Detroit 1987 proving to be one of the worst aviation disasters in American history.

6.title: Cold Case
6.plot: In March of 1992, a commuter plane fails to lift off from a LaGuardia Airport runway and plunges into the icy waters of Flushing Bay.

7.title: Pilot vs Plane
7.plot: Air France flight 296 fails to regain altitude after performing a fly-by during an air show at Mulhouse-Habsheim airport.

8.title: System Breakdown
8.plot: Numerous accidents cause experts to realize that the air traffic control system is overloaded and insufficient to the task, and we're given a glimpse into a new system called NexGen.

9.title: The Final Blow
9.plot: An Air Inter flight crashes into the Vosges mountains while attempting to land, killing most of the 96 passengers.

10.title: Cleared for Disaster
10.plot: At LAX, one of the busiest airports in the world, the unthinkable happens. As one plane prepares for takeoff, another prepares to land - on the same runway. In 1991, the fatal collision of US Air Flight 1493 and Skywest Flight 5569 sent fear into the hearts of air travelers. How could two aircrafts be assigned to the same runway at the same time? How did the pilots not see the other plane? We go from the control rooms to the cockpit to the tarmac to reveal how this tragedy happened and what's being done to prevent it from happening again.

11.title: The Plane That Flew Too High
11.plot: West Caribbean Airways flight 708 crashes down killing 160 people in 2005 ultimately leading to the bankruptcy of the troubled airline.

12.title: Deadly Reputation
12.plot: On July 17, 2007 TAM airlines flight 3054 slides off runway 35L at Congonhas airport in Sao Paulo, Brazil, and crashes at high speed into a warehouse adjacent to a petrol station, killing nearly 200 people.

1.title: Blind Spot
1.plot: A Boeing 727, on approach to Lindbergh Field, collides with a Cessna 172 over a residential area in San Diego causing both planes to crash and scattering body parts across a neighborhood.

2.title: Mayday Munich
2.plot: Disaster strikes a Munich airport and rocks the sports world when a charter aircraft carrying the Manchester United soccer team crashes during take-off, killing eight players. Soon after the 1958 accident, a dispute pits German examiners against the plane's pilot, a celebrated RAF captain. Revisit the crash of BEA Flight 609 as investigators try to determine if it was an icy wing or a slushy runway that brought the plane and its pilot's career to a bitter end.

3.title: I'm the Problem
3.plot: A recently fired airline employee buys a ticket on the flight on which his supervisor commutes to work and smuggles a large revolver on board.

4.title: Impossible Landing
4.plot: This chronicles the actions and events of 19 July 1989 when United Airlines Flight 232, from Denver to Chicago O'Hare, experiences a complete loss of all hydraulic fluid and had to make an emergency landing in Sioux City, IA.

5.title: Turning Point
5.plot: More than 35,000 feet above the Bering Sea, the crew of Northwest Airlines Flight 85 are battling with a crippled aircraft. The 386 passengers aboard are unaware of the potentially fatal drama unfolding in the cockpit. But they soon find out when the aircraft suddenly turns back to Alaska for an emergency landing. See how the pilots of this Boeing 747-400 apply their collective experience, and all of their physical strength, in a desperate attempt to bring their plane safely to the ground.

6.title: Break Up Over Texas
6.plot: In a blink of an eye, a commuter plane carrying 11 passengers from Laredo to Houston plummets to Earth, dropping thousands of feet in mere seconds. The aircraft slams into a farmer's field with an impact so violent, the wreckage is not even recognizable as an airplane. What caused the crash of Continental Express Flight 2574? Was it human error? Mechanical failure? An act of terrorism? Investigators sift through the scattered remains for answers but it isn't until they question the plane's inspectors that the tragic details come to light.

7.title: Under Pressure
7.plot: Nigeria Airways Flight 2120 races back to a Saudi Arabian airport just a few minutes after takeoff. The hydraulics system has failed, the cabin is filling with smoke, and flames in the wheel well are seconds away from igniting into a deadly fireball. Will the pilots be able to safely land the crippled DC-8 and save the lives of 247 passengers? Witness the harrowing 1991 emergency landing of Flight 2120 and the tragic truth behind its mechanical troubles.

8.title: The Invisible Plane
8.plot: A foggy morning in Milan turns deadly when an MD-87, leaving Italy's Linate Airport, collides with a Cessna crossing the same runway. Tragically, the crash site goes unnoticed in the control tower for several minutes because of near-zero visibility. It's only after the wounded come looking for help that authorities realize the magnitude of the catastrophe before them. Revisit the 2001 collision that claimed 118 lives, and discover the airport's shocking history of similar runway incursions and near misses.

9.title: Bad Attitude
9.plot: December 1999, just days before Christmas, Korean Air Cargo Flight 8509 crashes after takeoff. Experts quickly determine the cause of the disaster, but what they can't figure out is why no one aboard the plane did anything to stop it from happening. Join this baffling investigation as it shifts from a crash site examination to a lesson in Korean culture. The facts suggests the seeds of this deadly crash were actually sewn hundreds of years before the 747 even left the ground.

10.title: Split Decision
10.plot: What was supposed to be a joyous homecoming for the elite 101st Airborne Division ends in a tragic plane crash. Returning home from a peacekeeping mission in the Middle East, Arrow Air Flight 1285 fails to takeoff after a refueling stop in Newfoundland. Families in Kentucky awaiting the return of their loved ones are stunned and heartbroken when 248 soldiers perish in the crash. Exactly what caused the disaster is still a hotly debated subject. Conflicting reports, cries of terrorism and accusations of a cover-up circulate around this aviation disaster.

11.title: Nowhere to Land
11.plot: Caught in a severe thunderstorm en route from Belize to New Orleans, TACA Airlines Flight 110 is in trouble. Just 20 miles from the airport, the engines quit, effectively turning the Boeing 737 into a multi-ton glider. With no thrust and dropping 1,500 feet a minute, the crew needs to find a place to land, and fast. Brace for impact along with 38 passengers as the pilots, armed with little more than calm nerves and determination, attempt one of the most remarkable landings in the history of commercial aviation.

1.title: Fight for Control
1.plot: The emergency landing of a Reeve Aleutian Airlines ( flight 8 ) plane over the Pacific Ocean.

2.title: Fire in the Hold
2.plot: A plane crash into the alligator-infested Florida Everglades.

3.title: Caution to the Wind
3.plot: During heavy rainstorms caused by a nearby typhoon, a pilot in Singapore taxis his jet airliner to the wrong runway because of poor visibility.

4.title: Pushed to the Limit
4.plot: A flight from Jakarta, Indonesia crashes into the Musi River, and the limited evidence leads investigators to three different conclusions about what happened.

5.title: Blind Landing
5.plot: After a violent hailstorm brings down a plane in the middle of the Amazon, the investigation is compromised by local villagers.

6.title: Grand Canyon
6.plot: In 1956, before black boxes and nationwide radar coverage, two commercial airliners disappear over the Arizona desert, and are later found in pieces along the Grand Canyon floor and a canyon wall.

7.title: Catastrophe at O'Hare
7.plot: The 1979 crash in Chicago nearly grounded DC-10s forever.

8.title: Focused on Failure
8.plot: A DC-8's four engines flame out just miles from its destination.

9.title: Hockey Team Tragedy
9.plot: A Russian passenger jet crashes into the Volga River, killing almost everyone on board.

10.title: Death of the President
10.plot: Polish Air Force Tupolev Tu-154M: It was an air disaster that crippled a country, heightened tensions between two nations, and ignited conspiracy theories worldwide.

11.title: Subtle Incapacitation
11.plot: The 2010 crash of Ethiopian Airlines flight 409 sparks rumors of terrorism.

12.title: Seconds to Survive
12.plot: Santa Barbara Airlines flight 518 disappears in the Andes Mountains.

13.title: Vanished
13.plot: On June 1, 2009, a modern Airbus A330, traveling from Rio de Janeiro to Paris, vanished somewhere over the Atlantic.

1.title: Flight to the Death
1.plot: A poisonous cockpit may have caused the 1972 crash of British European Airlines Flight 548.

2.title: Speed Trap
2.plot: A 1971 midair collision between an Airwest DC-9 and an F4-Phantom jet fighter.

3.title: Lost in Translation
3.plot: The 2000 crash in Switzerland of Crossair Flight 498, a commuter flight, is investigated.

4.title: Tragedy on the Potomac
4.plot: The crash of Air Florida Flight 90 on 13 January 1982 from National Airport into the icy Potomac River during a snowstorm in the Washington, DC area.

5.title: Queens Catastrophe
5.plot: A plane crash (American Airlines flight 587) in New York just two months after 9/11.

6.title: Into the Eye of the Storm
6.plot: Hugo, a category 5 hurricane, threatens to rip a plane apart.

7.title: Massacre Over the Mediterranian
7.plot: In 1980, Italian commercial flight Itavia Flight 870 carrying 77 passengers and four crew from Bologna, Italy to Palermo, crashes into the Tyrrhenian Sea. After years of investigations, speculations of a bomb to a stray missile during an air engagement and even accusations of high treason have never yielded a concrete explanation of the plane's demise.

8.title: Imperfect Pitch
8.plot: During an in-flight test for XL Airways Germany Airbus A320, the aircraft suddenly pitches up, loses lift, then crashes into the sea.

9.title: Getting Out Alive
9.plot: An examination of several different incidents, including the "Miracle on the Hudson", speculates about what part of the plane has the highest chance of survival during a crash.

10.title: Terror in Paradise
10.plot: A seven minute island-hop from Moorea to Tahiti ends in disaster.

11.title: Titanic in the Sky
11.plot: An emergency landing is forced by pilots after an engine explodes. [ Airbus A380 Airliner ]

1.title: Mistaken Identity
1.plot: US Navy cruiser spots an airplane approaching them on a radar. Numerous attempts to contact the aircraft go unanswered. Is it a friend or a foe? The Navy commander must make a decision whether or not to shoot down the approaching airplane.

2.title: Bomb on Board
2.plot: Discusses an in-flight bombing on flight 434, on Philippine Airlines.

3.title: Fight for Your Life
3.plot: Three Fedex crew members must fight off a cockpit attack from another employee in mid-flight.

4.title: Out of Control
4.plot: Improper repairs to the aft bulkhead fails, Loses vertical stabilizer and severs all 4 hydraulic lines. Example of Phugoid cycle.

5.title: Attack Over Baghdad
5.plot: A 2003 surface-to-air missile attack in Iraq on a DHL Airbus A300, which was carrying letters home from U.S. soldiers, is recalled. The plane was hit moments after departing Baghdad International Airport. { Maybe S6, Ep2 }

6.title: Hanging by a Thread
6.plot: The roof tears off of Aloha Airlines 243, a Boeing 737, at 24,000 feet.

7.title: Helicopter Down
7.plot: The discovery of oil in the North Sea led to economic riches in Britain, and to a terrifying air disaster in 1995.

8.title: Death and Denial
8.plot: Was it a mechanical failure or a suicidal pilot that doomed Egypt Air Flight 990? Years later, the dispute continues.

9.title: Kid in the Cockpit
9.plot: Enter the cockpit of RIA Flight 593, where pilots battle an uncooperative plane, gravity, and a teen at the wheel.

10.title: Ocean Landing
10.plot: Witness a brave pilot battle against hijackers and a crippled plane to land his passenger jet on the open ocean.

1.title: Miracle Escape
1.plot: Runway overruns have become far too common at airports, none more harrowing than the crash of Air France 358.

2.title: Falling from the Sky
2.plot: Witness the bizarre phenomena that overtook a 747 in 1982, and how it gave pilots a whole new danger to look out for.

3.title: Fire Fight
3.plot: Witness the electrical fire that struck a DC-9 six miles in the air and the tragedy that occurred once the plane landed.

4.title: Missed Approach
4.plot: During heavy rain, KAL flight 801, a Boeing 747, somehow crash-lands three miles short of the runway during the landing approach in Guam.

5.title: Hidden Danger
5.plot: Witness the longest crash investigation in aviation history, involving three out-of-control Boeing 737s.

6.title: Panic Over the Pacific
6.plot: Watch a masterful feat of flying that saved a plane from crashing to the sea and the damning investigation that followed.

7.title: Out of Sight
7.plot: See how a midair collision over Cerritos, CA in 1986 led to a historic collision avoidance system still used today.

8.title: Fog of War
8.plot: See how a fatal combination of factors brought down a military 747 and took the life of a Democratic Party VIP in 1996.

9.title: Vertigo
9.plot: One of aviation history's strangest crashes and why it might remain a mystery forever.

10.title: Ghost Plane
10.plot: The case of Helios Airways 737, in which a passenger flight circling Athens fails to respond to air-traffic controllers.

1.title: Choosing Sides
1.plot: One of the worst crashes in British history has a stunning cause that changed aviation safety forever.

2.title: Testing the Limits
2.plot: What caused a 767 to break apart in mid-air? A world-famous race car driver discovers a surprising answer.

3.title: Vanishing Act
3.plot: After a terrifying crash, survivors face a new challenge: surviving the remote Brazilian jungle.

4.title: Sideswiped
4.plot: Relive the crash of Copa Airlines Flight 201 and the harrowing investigation in one of the world's most remote jungles.

5.title: The Final Push
5.plot: See if two MD-11 planes crashes, nearly 12 years apart, were both the result of pilot error or a flaw in the aircraft itself.

6.title: The Death of JFK Jr.
6.plot: Relive one of the most shocking air disasters in American history as we revisit the 1999 crash that killed JFK Jr.

7.title: Concorde - Up in Flames
7.plot: The 2000 crash of an Air France Concorde into a Paris hotel is investigated.

8.title: Accident or Assassination
8.plot: When a government-chartered Learjet crashes into Mexico City, drug cartels are suspected, but there's more to the story.

9.title: No Clear Options
9.plot: Follow Irish examiners as they look beyond the fog of Cork Airport to find the real reason why a commuter plane crashed.

10.title: Death in the Arctic
10.plot: Revisit the remarkable story of First Air Flight 6560, involving a mysterious crash and an unbelievable rescue effort.

1.title: Fatal Transmission
1.plot: What caused the fiery collision at Quincy Regional Airport between United Express 5925 and another small plane?

2.title: Terror in San Francisco
2.plot: The crash of Asiana Flight 214 in San Francisco shook the world and the investigation proved to be just as dramatic.

3.title: High Rise Catastrophe
3.plot: Follow the investigation of the controversial crash of an El Al 747 into a high-rise Amsterdam apartment complex.

4.title: Fatal Focus
4.plot: Investigate the crash of Garuda Flight 200, which hit the runway 100 mph too fast, claiming the lives of 21 people.

5.title: Fatal Delivery
5.plot: Witness the desperate attempt to land UPS Flight 6 after its cargo catches fire in the skies over Dubai.

6.title: Carnage in São Paolo
6.plot: Join the investigation to see what caused a plane to slam into a São Paulo neighborhood just 25 seconds after takeoff.

7.title: Deadly Delay
7.plot: Revisit the 2008 crash of a MD-82 aircraft as it happened, and the chain of events that led to the disaster.

8.title: Steep Impact
8.plot: Revisit the crash and investigation of a commuter plane that claimed the lives of a NASA astronaut and a former senator.

9.title: Edge of Disaster
9.plot: See how a slick runway, a mechanical failure, and a design flaw sent a Norwegian plane off the runway and down a cliff.

10.title: Deadly Mission
10.plot: Investigate the case of the mysterious 1961 plane crash in the Congo that claimed the life of UN Secretary General Dag Hammarskjöld.

1.title: Deadly Silence
1.plot: Discover the alarming reason why a jet carrying golfer Payne Stewart crashed.

2.title: The Pentagon Attack
2.plot: See how the Pentagon attack on 9/11 was carried out and how it permanently altered air travel today.

3.title: Disaster at Tenerife
3.plot: Join us as we examine the 1977 crash at Los Rodeos Airport that killed 583 people and the shocking reasons behind it.

4.title: Deadly Detail
4.plot: Discover the tiny design flaw that doomed China Airlines Flight 120 after landing and put the lives of passengers and crew in peril.

5.title: Deadly Detour
5.plot: Witness the 1998 crash over France's Quiberon Bay and discover the unbelievable chain of events that caused it.

6.title: Dangerous Approach
6.plot: See how an unlikely tipoff leads investigators to a shocking discovery about the crash of a Colorado commuter plane.

7.title: Murder in the Skies
7.plot: Follow the investigation of the 2015 Germanwings crash that put the blame not only on the co-pilot, but on the entire medical industry.

8.title: River Runway
8.plot: In the face of violent weather, engine failure, and the loss of electrical power, pilots of Garuda Indonesia Flight 421 manage an epic landing.

9.title: Deadly Solution
9.plot: Follow the dizzying crash of AirAsia Flight 8501 into the Java Sea and discover the tragically preventable cause.

10.title: Afghan Nightmare
10.plot: Witness the crash of a cargo plane leaving an Afghanistan airfield and the investigation that nearly got it all wrong.

1.title: Explosive Proof
1.plot: The inside story of one of history's most infamous and complex investigations, the 1996 crash of TWA Flight 800.

2.title: Killer Attitude
2.plot: Discover what doomed Northwest Airlink Flight 5719 months before it even took off.

3.title: Deadly Myth
3.plot: See how conflicting instructions between a plane's manufacturer, an airline, and the FAA doomed Comair Flight 3272.

4.title: The Turning Point
4.plot: Revisit the worst air disaster in South Korean history: the 2002 crash of Air China Flight 129.

5.title: Lethal Turn
5.plot: Investigate the chain of events that led to the loss of 234 lives aboard an Airbus A300.

6.title: Storming Out
6.plot: Enter the cockpit of USAir Flight 1016 as pilots battle against a sudden and deadly microburst.

7.title: Caught on Tape
7.plot: Revisit the infamous crash of TransAsia Flight 235 in Taiwan, captured on video, and follow the race to find the cause.

8.title: Terror Over Egypt
8.plot: Join investigators as they race to determine if a midair explosion was caused by mechanical failure or a terrorist act.

9.title: Deadly Discussions
9.plot: Discover the staggering blunder that caused a plane in Buenos Aires to crash on takeoff.

10.title: The Lost Plane
10.plot: How did a plane flying south of an airport end up slamming into mountains to its north?

imdb.title: Air Disasters
plot: Each episode details an aircraft accident detailing the events leading up to the incident and the following investigation. Each investigation providing the cause of the accident along with steps taken by the industry to make flying safer.::warpedice
